progetto.network

Class SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IRoomRequest

    final class SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest
extends java.lang.Object
implements IRoomRequest
    Request sent when the player wishes to send a message to another player inside the room
    Author:
    Massimo

      private java.lang.String message 
      private int targetID

      SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest(java.lang.String message, int targetID)
      Builds the requests

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void execute(AbstractRoom room, ServerConnection serverConnection)
      tries to send the message, notice that send message depends on the implementation of AbstractRoom, therefore a room could refuse to send the message

    • Constructor Detail

      • SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest

        SendPrivateMessageRoomRequest(java.lang.String message,
                              int targetID)
        Builds the requests
        Parameters:
        message - the message that must be sent to the player
        targetID - the id of the player that must receive the message.

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        public void execute(AbstractRoom room,
                    ServerConnection serverConnection)
        tries to send the message, notice that send message depends on the implementation of AbstractRoom, therefore a room could refuse to send the message
        Specified by:
        execute in interface IRoomRequest
        Parameters:
        room - The room where the player is located.
        serverConnection - the connection that sent the message
